item.title: Viz For Social Good
item.description: Viz For Social Good volunteers create informative and impactful data visualizations for mission-driven organizations across the globe. Check out the organisation here. Code available at: github.com/nrennie/Viz_For_Social_Good VFSG: Visualize Our Community Non-profits around the world are driving positive social change but some of them lack the in-house resources to effectively tell their story with the data they have. Viz For Social Good (VFSG) helps non-profits thrive by connecting talented community members with organizations in need of data visualization skill sets.
